entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[exception:FileNotFoundError] Instance validation exception: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'D:/DJT/Documents/GitHub/davidtauriello/dqc_us_rules/dqc_us_rules/dqc-us-2020-V22-ruleset.zip', instance: plt-20210403.htm - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/914025/000091402521000019/plt-20210403.htm Traceback (most recent call last): File "D:\a\Arelle\Arelle\arelle\Validate.py", line 109, in validate File "D:\a\Arelle\Arelle\arelle\ValidateXbrl.py", line 565, in validate File "C:\Program Files\Arelle\plugin\xule\__init__.py", line 1009, in xuleValidate runXule(_cntlr, options, val.modelXbrl, xule_validator['map_name']) File "C:\Program Files\Arelle\plugin\xule\__init__.py", line 918, in runXule rule_set.open(rule_set_location, open_packages=not getattr(options, 'xule_bypass_packages', False)) File "C:\Program Files\Arelle\plugin\xule\XuleRuleSet.py", line 120, in open file_object = self._get_rule_set_file_object() ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ File "C:\Program Files\Arelle\plugin\xule\XuleRuleSet.py", line 159, in _get_rule_set_file_object file_object = file_source.file(self.location, binary=True)[0] ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ File "D:\a\Arelle\Arelle\arelle\FileSource.py", line 591, in file File "D:\a\Arelle\Arelle\arelle\FileSource.py", line 790, in openFileStream FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'D:/DJT/Documents/GitHub/davidtauriello/dqc_us_rules/dqc_us_rules/dqc-us-2020-V22-ruleset.zip'
